snippet: The leaders wonder if President Trump will support Syrian rebels, get tougher with Iran, or increase the American military’s presence in the region....
lead_paragraph: The leaders wonder if President Trump will support Syrian rebels, get tougher with Iran, or increase the American military’s presence in the region.
